description.text: this message file contains messages for basedif2ngd, basnedif, and baspp packages

msg.text: $$s is invalid.
Port '$$s' of block '$$s' is '$$s' type, but is connected to bidirectional buffer.
Cell "$$s": PMI_FAMILY value is "$$s" while targeted architecture is "$$s". Set PMI_FAMILY to "$$s" and try again.
OrcaPP failed to generate $$s.cmd for creating $$s edif netlist\n
Generating edif netlist for IP cell $$s\n
Failed to execute ip command file $$s\n
Failed to generate edif netlist from $$s\n
Unable to locate ip command file $$s\n
Unrecognized PMI Property.
Error in edif2ngd.
Valid libraries are:\n
Found env variable LU_FIXMSMEMBUG: MS small memory allocator disabled.
Invalid architecture "$$s".
User property filter file specified with -r flag. Ignoring -r flag, LOC properties may appear in the NGD.
Invalid file argument '$$s'.
No device specified. Will use default.\n
No string.
Unable to located bus name for pin $$s.
Number of pins in Property '$$s' are not equal to bus size for bus $$s.
Bad format for internal bus reference: $$s.
this means the bus format used is not of the form:.
Bad format for internal bus reference: $$s has $$d matches
a<1:8> a[1:8] a{1:8} a(1:8) or a_8:0. Since it is not
in the expected form, it will be treated as an expanded
bus and the bus will not be recreated in back.
Property $$s has no value - ignoring...
Unsupported property $$s found - ignoring...
Property $$s has type error: $$s given while $$s expected - ignoring...
-a Write all properties.
Default is write only delay properties.
-n Write out a flattened netlist with no properties.
-v <vendor> Target this EDIF file to a specific CAE.
vendor (ie viewlog, mentor, lmg).
-w Overwrite the output file.
-p <propfile> Use the input property filter file.
<ngdfile> Input File: '.ngd' or '.nga.'
<outfile> Output file name (default is '<infile>.edn').
Found env variable LU_FIXMSMEMBUG: MS small memory allocator disabled.
Invalid file argument '$$s'.
Output file '$$s' exists, use '-w' option to overwrite.
Unable to write output file '$$s'.
Unable to open input file '$$s'
Unable to open temporary output file '$$s'.
writing all properties to EDIF file.
writing only delay properties to EDIF file.
Unable to copy temporary file '$$s' to '$$s'.
Unable to remove temporary file '$$s'.
Input file '$$s' has not been annotated, run ngdanno.
Input file '$$s' has not been processed by ngdbuild.
Unable to netlist empty design.
writing EDIF file to '$$s' ...
Unable to create memory initialization file '$$s'
writing memory initialization file to '$$s' ...
Adding $$s.
Merging two signals to a global: $$s and $$s.
Unable to add root block pin for signal $$s.
Logical design hierarchy is empty.
running NGD DRC ...
-p will perform phys-log operations always.
-l will remain with logical.
default uses physical block has_loganno flag.
-g will string global signals through the hierarchy.
-n will fully flatten the hierarchy.
-d will not perform post drc.
-r will not do root blk pins.
-c will not do clipped logic removal.
-i will not insert inverters on inverted pins.
-e will not expand combinatoric gates.
-j will not flatten intermediate primitive levels.
-k will not do picspec checking.
-t will not tie unused input comb pins to pwr/gnd.
-u will tie unused input ff/latch pins to pwr/gnd.
-s will not set output delays to zero (if unannotated).
-x will not transfer physical pinnames onto pads.
Invalid file argument '$$s'.
Unable to open input file $$s.
Unable tp open output file $$s.
reading design from $$s...
running preprocessor...
writing design to $$s...
